Scourge(to rage): Say Beastmode in order to return to beast form. say 
terrorize in order to change to robot form.

Rampage, Inferno, and Tankorr arrive at the new ship.
Rampage: Whoever is in there I am Sub-Commander Rampage of the Predacon army.
Inferno: We demand to know what you have done with the royalty.
Rampage: We will use force if necessary!

Inside the ship Ares reports for duty
Ares: Ready and waiting for orders Commander Shuko. I wanna kill something 
like the God of War I am.
